name: Slack Telegram skin
description:
Redesign message container of Slack.
Will look like Telegram desktop.
additional_info:
Changelog:

2018-07-06: notification bar vertical-aligned properly

2018-06-08: fixed minor bug with attach button

2018-05-24: fixed multiple bugs, now style is compatible with Slack

2015-06-28: reverted to Slack styles for textarea. Slack often changes its styles and I don't want to adjust them again and again

2016-04-06: many small changes to get more closer to Telegram skin; slack textarea seems to be finalized from their side - I've customized it again

2017-01-19: made texrarea closed to Slack style and more natural; fixed lots of styles
